mapper.insert: insert into product ( product_id, user_id, product_main_title, product_sub_title, product_body, product_price, product_discount, product_amount, product_main_category, product_sub_category, product_states ) values ( concat('product_', nextval('product')), #{user_id}, #{product_main_title}, #{product_sub_title}, #{product_body}, #{product_price}, #{product_discount}, #{product_amount}, #{product_main_category}, #{product_sub_category}, 0 )
mapper.select: select count_no from sequences where sequence_name='product'
mapper.update: update product set user_id = #{user_id}, product_main_title = #{product_main_title}, product_sub_title = #{product_sub_title}, product_body = #{product_body}, product_price = #{product_price}, product_discount = #{product_discount}, product_amount = #{product_amount}, product_main_category = #{product_main_category}, product_sub_category = #{product_sub_category} where product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.select:
select * from product where
product_cre_date between #{begin} and date_add(#{end}, interval 1 day) order by product_cre_date desc
product_main_title like concat('%', #{search_value}, '%') order by product_cre_date desc
product_states = #{search_value} order by product_cre_date desc
